description:
Detective Kogoro is asked to be the bodyguard of the owner of a high-end host club. On the first day of his duties, he finds the owner dead in his own pool. It looks like one of the members of his annual four-person class reunion may be responsible.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: اجتماع الخريجين المكون من أربعة أشخاص فقط
